info.task: navigate backwards to an image inside a banner landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards to an image inside a banner landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterBanner
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the banner landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the banner landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('afterlink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'W3C Logo' image.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'W3C Logo' image.
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
